analysis.description:
CoinHb.airdrop_times (/unique_chucks/22/0x13d76c81c7cc04ac1bcaf5229a3fccf4139dca76.sol#264-268) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- airDrop (/unique_chucks/22/0x13d76c81c7cc04ac1bcaf5229a3fccf4139dca76.sol#287-375)

CoinHb.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x13d76c81c7cc04ac1bcaf5229a3fccf4139dca76.sol#185-247) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= direct_drop_range_start && block.timestamp <= direct_drop_range_end) (/unique_chucks/22/0x13d76c81c7cc04ac1bcaf5229a3fccf4139dca76.sol#194-200)

CoinHb.airDrop (/unique_chucks/22/0x13d76c81c7cc04ac1bcaf5229a3fccf4139dca76.sol#287-375) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= air_drop_range_start && block.timestamp <= air_drop_range_end) (/unique_chucks/22/0x13d76c81c7cc04ac1bcaf5229a3fccf4139dca76.sol#304-307)
